name: Pork Chops with Fresh Tomato, Onion, Garlic, and Feta
author: Lovecooking
summary: You will not be disappointed with this wonderful pork chop. It is tender, moist, and full of fresh flavors. I serve with garlic mashed potatoes and asparagus. It's a favorite in our household.
ingredients: 1 large onion, halved and thinly sliced
½ pint red grape tomatoes, halved
½ pint yellow grape tomatoes, halved
directions: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a skillet over medium heat
Stir in the onion and cook until golden brown
Heat 1/2 tablespoon oil in the skillet
Season pork chops with salt, pepper, and garlic powder, and place in the skillet
Heat remaining oil in the skillet
Return onions to skillet, and stir in tomatoes, garlic, and basil
Cook and stir about 3 minutes, until tomatoes are tender
Mix in balsamic vinegar, and season with salt and pepper
Top chops with the onion and tomato mixture, and sprinkle with feta cheese to serve
